title: US should stop 'encouraging' Ukraine war, Brazilian president says
description: Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Saturday that the United States should stop "encouraging" the war in Ukraine.

title: Top French court backs unpopular plans to raise retirement age to 64
description: France's top court on Friday approved the government's unpopular plans to raise the age of retirement, in a huge win for President Emmanuel Macron in the face of mass protests across the country.

title: Man arrested after explosion prompts evacuation of Japanese leader Fumio Kishida from speech venue
description: Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida was evacuated unharmed Saturday after an explosion at a venue where he was giving an outdoor speech.

title: A deadly volcano could erupt 'within days or weeks' in Colombia. But only a small fraction of locals have evacuated
description: Hundreds of families in Colombia are facing a choice: abandon their homes and livelihoods, or face the devastation of a predicted volcanic eruption in the coming weeks.

title: 'A new era': Germany quits nuclear power, closing its final three plants
description: Germany's final three nuclear power plants close their doors on Saturday, marking the end of the country's nuclear era that has spanned more than six decades.

title: On one of the world's most dangerous migrant routes, a cartel makes millions off the American dream
description: There is always a crowd, but it can feel very lonely.
